# F# Language Reference

> Comprehensive reference for F# language syntax including types, functions, modules, and expressions. Covers F#-specific features like discriminated unions, pattern matching, computation expressions, and type providers. F# is a functional-first language that also supports object-oriented and imperative programming.

*Topics available: 119*

## Subtopics

- [F# Language Reference Extended Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/llms-extended.txt): 71 additional topics
- [Compiler errors and warnings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/compiler-messages/llms.txt): Topics available: 13; Compiler errors and warnings documentation and reference.
- [Exception Handling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/exception-handling/llms.txt): Topics available: 7; Exception Handling documentation and reference.
- [Functions Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/functions/llms.txt): Topics available: 8; Functions Docs documentation and reference.
- [Generics Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/generics/llms.txt): Topics available: 4; Generics Docs documentation and reference.
- [Members Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/members/llms.txt): Topics available: 9; Members Docs documentation and reference.
- [Symbol and Operator Reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/symbol-and-operator-reference/llms.txt): Topics available: 5; Symbol and Operator Reference documentation and reference.
- [Values Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/values/llms.txt): Topics available: 2; Values Docs documentation and reference.
